security.heading: Your bank accounts and investments are safe
security.text: Mizan uses advanced encryption and trusted connections to keep your accounts and investments safe — always.

q1.a: Mizan is a personal finance management app that helps you understand your financial health through detailed insights and easy-to-use tools.

q2.q: How do I start using Mizan?
q2.a: You can start using Mizan by downloading the app from the App Store or Google Play.

q3.q: Can Mizan be used for free?
q3.a: Yes, Mizan can be used for free. However, there may be premium features available for purchase.

q4.a: Yes, Mizan takes the security and privacy of your financial data seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information.

q5.q: Can I track my investments with Mizan?
q5.a: Yes, you can track the performance of your investments, such as stocks, funds, and real estate, using Mizan.

q6.q: What is the purpose of the app's Net Worth feature?
q6.a: Our Net Worth feature helps you track your overall financial health by calculating the total value of your assets minus your liabilities, giving you a clear picture of your financial standing.

q7.q: Can I link multiple bank accounts?
q7.a: Yes, you can link multiple bank accounts from different institutions to get a comprehensive view of your finances in one place.

q8.a: We use bank-level encryption and security measures to protect your data. Your sensitive information is encrypted and we never store your banking credentials.

q9.q: How do I update my personal details?
q9.a: You can update your personal details in the Settings section of your profile. Simply navigate to your profile and click on the Edit button.

q10.a: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. You can enable it in your security settings.

q11.q: Can I set financial goals in the app?
q11.a: Yes, you can set and track various financial goals like savings targets, debt repayment, or investment objectives through our goal-setting feature.

q12.q: Will the app give me recommendations to save more?
q12.a: Yes, our app provides personalized recommendations based on your spending patterns and financial habits to help you save more effectively.

q13.q: How do I manage my subscriptions?
q13.a: You can view and manage all your subscriptions in the Subscriptions section. Here you can track recurring payments and cancel or modify subscriptions.

q14.q: Can I set reminders for subscription renewals?
q14.a: Yes, you can set up notifications for upcoming subscription renewals to help you stay on top of your recurring payments.

q15.q: How do I contact support if I encounter an issue?
q15.a: You can reach our support team through the Help Center in the app, or by emailing support@example.com. We typically respond within 24 hours.
